props.name: allowReselect
props.desc: If set to true then reselecting a color that is already selected fires the selection event

props.name: itemCls
props.desc: The CSS class to apply to the containing element (defaults to "x-color-palette")

props.name: value
props.desc:
The initial color to highlight (should be a valid 6-digit color hex code without the # symbol).  Note that
the hex codes are case-sensitive.

events.name: select
events.desc: Fires when a color is selected
